questions.question_text: "reservation" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: An arrangement to keep something for future use
A written summary after a meeting
questions.example_sentence: Conference room reservations must be made through the internal system.
questions.explanation:
予約・事前確保
会議後の要約
社内規定の変更
予期しないシステムエラー

questions.question_text: "availability" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The state of being able to be used or scheduled
questions.example_sentence: Please confirm your availability before the meeting is scheduled.
questions.explanation:
利用可能状況・都合
承認業者リスト
正式な苦情
内部監査

questions.question_text: "confirm" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To make sure something is correct or decided
questions.example_sentence: Participants are asked to confirm their attendance by Friday.
questions.explanation:
確認する
依頼を取り消す
決定を延期する
詳しく説明する

questions.question_text: "requirement" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Something that is necessary or mandatory
questions.example_sentence: Meeting room use is subject to specific safety requirements.
questions.explanation:
必要条件・必須事項
任意の提案
完了した作業
報酬

questions.question_text: "coordinate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To organize activities so they work well together
questions.example_sentence: The assistant will coordinate schedules among all departments.
questions.explanation:
調整する・連携させる
提案を却下する
財務データを記録する
報告書を簡略化する
